title: Foundations of Assessment Design in Continuing Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical concepts and fundamental principles of curriculum design
context.additional_context: Students progress through personalized microlearning modules on mobile devices, with learning effectiveness measured via real-time feedback and weekly comprehensive assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between evaluation types (formative/summative) in medical continuing education and select appropriate methods for given contexts.
Learners can utilize an assessment design tool to analyze the alignment between educational objectives, assessment items, and outcomes.
Learners can perform multidimensional data collection (multiple-choice quizzes, learning log analysis, self-assessment surveys) applicable in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
